name: cluster_id
description: Unique identifier for cluster

name: X_protein_count
description: Count of proteins of taxon X

name: attribute
description: Name of attribute

name: taxon_set
description: Name of Taxset

name: cluster_total_count
description: Count of clusters with Taxset as member

name: protein_total_count
description: Count of proteins from Taxset

name: protein_total_span
description: Count of amino acids in proteins from Taxset

name: singleton_cluster_count
description: Count of singleton clusters (contain only one protein)

name: singleton_protein_count
description: Number of proteins in singleton clusters (NOT NEEDED)

name: singleton_protein_span
description: Count of amino acids in singleton clusters

name: specific_cluster_count
description: Count of specific, non-singleton clusters

name: specific_protein_count
description: Count of proteins in specific, non-singleton clusters

name: specific_protein_span
description: Count of amino acids in specific, non-singleton clusters

name: shared_cluster_count
description: Count of shared clusters

name: shared_protein_count
description: Count of proteins in shared clusters

name: shared_protein_span
description: Count of amino acids in shared clusters

name: specific_cluster_true_1to1_count
description: Count of specific, 1:1-orthologue-clusters

name: specific_cluster_fuzzy_count
description: Count of specific, fuzzy-orthologue-clusters

name: shared_cluster_true_1to1_count
description: Count of shared, 1:1-orthologue-clusters

name: shared_cluster_fuzzy_count
description: Count of shared, fuzzy-orthologue clusters

name: absent_cluster_total_count
description: Count of clusters from which members of Taxset are absent

name: absent_cluster_singleton_count
description: Count of singleton clusters from which members of Taxset are absent

name: absent_cluster_specific_count
description: Count of specific clusters from which members of Taxset are absent

name: absent_cluster_shared_count
description: Count of shared clusters from which members of Taxset are absent

name: TAXON_count
description: Count of members in Taxset

name: TAXON_taxa
description: Names of members in Taxset

name: cluster_status
description: Presence of members in Taxset

name: cluster_type
description: Cluster type regarding Taxset

name: counts_cluster_protein_count
description: Count of proteins

name: counts_cluster_proteome_count
description: Count of taxa

name: counts_TAXON_protein_count
description: Count of proteins from Taxset

name: counts_TAXON_mean_count
description: Mean count of proteins per taxon in Taxset

name: counts_non_taxon_mean_count
description: Mean count of proteins per taxon NOT in Taxset

name: representation
description: Enrichment or depletion in mean proteins count of Taxset vs background

name: log2_mean(TAXON/others)
description: Protein count representation test based on 'taxset_mean_protein_count' and 'background_mean_protein_count'

name: pvalue(TAXON vs. others)
description: p-value of the protein count representation test

name: coverage_TAXON_coverage
description: Proportion of taxa in Taxset present in the cluster

name: coverage_TAXON_count
description: Count of taxa in Taxset present in the cluster

name: coverage_non_TAXON_count
description: Count of background taxa present in the cluster

name: TAXON_taxa
description: Names of taxa in Taxset present in the cluster

name: non_TAXON_taxa
description: Names of background taxa present in the cluster

name: cluster_protein_count
description: Count of proteins

name: protein_median_count
description: Median count of proteins

name: TAXON_count
description: Count of taxa

name: attribute
description: Attribute

name: attribute_cluster_type
description: Attribute cluster type

name: protein_span_mean
description: Mean protein span

name: protein_span_sd
description: Standard deviation protein span

name: protein_counts_X_count
description: Count of proteins of taxset X

name: protein_counts_X_median
description: Median count of proteins of taxset X

name: protein_counts_X_cov
description: Proportion of taxa present in taxset X
